Ordered a couple great items and got exactly what I ordered no problems and will definitely order from BatteryStuff.com again

I have been using battery stuff. Com for years. Always recommend them to friends and family.Only had an issue with one battery in all the time I have been using battery stuff. My issue was resolved in about three emails.I will continue using and recommending battery stuff for their order accuracy, quality products, speedy delivery and great service people.

For two decades, I have been purchasing all my motorcycle batteries from BatteryStuff.com. Have always been happy with the battery performance, durability, price, and convenience of receiving the battery in the mail within two or three days.

I used this battery on a Craftsman lawn tractor (hYIX30HL Scorpion 12v 450 CCA Harley HVT-2 AGM Motorcycle Battery). The previous same battery lasted 4 years 10 months before failing. I used a Battery tender Plus with it throughout its life. Great service, fast shipping and no damage in shipment. I hope my new battery lasts the same amount of time.

For over 10 years now, everything Batterystuff delivered was excellent quality - for example, I bought an AGM motorcycle battery from them in 2017 and it's now 2023 and it still works fine.  It's a no brainer to go there if you need a battery.

Awesome battery.  This is the third battery that ive purchased for my motorcycles. I still have one working perfectly and it's a 2018 battery. I will continue to purchase the scorpion stinger plus battery for all my bikes and, I highly recommend them.
I've used BatteryStuff for about 10 years and I always love that they have the battery I need and send it right out. I like the AGM batteries they carry.
all good as advertisedon my 3rd motorcycle over the years...
